docTitle.titlePart:
Pressure Transducers
9000 Series -Pressure Scanning System &
Data Acquisition

front.div:
Features:
Compact Size
Networkable Comm.
Intelligent Scanning
Precision Measurements
Eng'g Unit Conversion
Modular Configurations
Rackmount Mainframes
9010 9030
The 9000 Series components are an alternative to large centralized data acquisition systems. All
have 32-bit processing and control, output in engineering units and can be networked via
RS-485/RS-422 or Ethernet TCP/IP. They use standard protocols compatible with LabView™,
LabWindows™, AutoNet™ and other application software.
Model 9010/9015/9016 -Multipoint,
Pneumatic Press. Scanner
RS232, RS422 or Ethernet -8 or 16
pressure inputs direct to your PC!
Self-contained module for measurement of dry,
non-corrosive gases. Internally corrects for zero,
span, non-linearity and temperature errors. zero
and span calibration in the field. +/-0.05% FS
accuracy, +/-0.001%/°C thermal stability.
Range: 10°WC to 750 psid (2.5 to 5200 kPa)
Model 9020/ 9021 -Multipoint All-Media
Press. Scanner
RS232, RS422 or Ethernet -12 Chns of
distributed liquid pressures! Pre-eng.
solution for multiple liquid pressure transducer
measurements. (High Combined with PSI's
Model 9400/9401pressure transducers, it
internally corrects for zero, span, non-linearity
and temperature errors. +/-0.1% FS accuracy
+/-0.005%/°C thermal stability. range: 5 to
